#summary Using Vim to analyze Helgrind reports

You may use [http://www.vim.org Vim] to simplify browsing the Helgrind reports.

First, add this to your vimrc: 
{{{
function! Gfw()
  let b = bufnr('')
  normal mz
  let b = bufnr('')
  wincmd w
  exe "b " . b
  normal `zgF
endfun

nnoremap ;f :call Gfw()<cr>
}}}

Then, open the Helgrind log file and split the window vertically (using {{{:vsplit}}}).
Move the cursor to the {{{file_name.cc:1234}}} and type {{{;f}}}

http://data-race-test.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/helgrind-vim.png
